revisionDesc.change: converted from P4 to P5, checked

lg.l: National hymns, the real American music,
The master's words, arrogant, fluent, final severe.—
And there a lumberers hunter's camp of hunters
Roaming over Camping Climbing out on the Adirondacks or by the Saginaw lak
